# intensity

**Instance Property**

The intensity of the effect.

## Declaration

```swift
var intensity: Float { get set }
```

## Discussion

A value of 0.0 is no effect. A value of 1.0 is the maximum effect.

## Instance Properties

- **inputImage**: The image to use as an input image.
- **radius**: The radius, in pixels, of the effect.
